sense.gloss: turning point, change, transition, turn (of the tide, century, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑世紀↑↓せいき↓の↑変↑↓|か↓わり↑目↑↓め|↓に↑子供↑↓こども↓たちはまだ↑工場↑↓こうじょう↓で↑働↑↓はたら↓いていた。
sdata.e: At the turn of the century, children still worked in factories.

sdata.j: ↑季節↑↓きせつ↓の↑変↑↓|か↓わり↑目↑↓め|↓は↑体調↑↓たいちょう↓↑崩↑↓くず↓しがちだから↑気↑↓き↓をつけてね。
sdata.e: The changing of the seasons have a tendency to affect our health, so take care.
